data.comment: The big names in today's match at Molineux Stadium have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Tottenham's Heung Min Son is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 1, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 1, Goal! Tanguy Ndombele gives Tottenham a 0-1 lead in Wolverhampton.
Great play from Ben Davies to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Wolverhampton.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Paul Tierney blows against Wolverhampton's Fabio Silva for offside.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a Tottenham throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 7, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 9, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Podence of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 12, Paul Tierney signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Tottenham's area.
Sergio Reguilon (Tottenham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 14, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Conor Coady (Wolverhampton) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tottenham defenders.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
In the minute 18, Wolverhampton drive upfield and Romain Saiss gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergio Reguilon gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
In the minute 21, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Paul Tierney waits before resuming play because Conor Coady for Wolverhampton is still down.
Conor Coady returns to the field for Wolverhampton after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 28, Wolverhampton's Fabio Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 35, Adama Traore for Wolverhampton is whistled offside.
In Wolverhampton Wolverhampton drive forward through Daniel Podence. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Harry Winks (Tottenham) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
The second-half has started.
Daniel Podence is booked for the home team.
In the minute 47, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Fabio Silva for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Molineux Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 52, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Conor Coady (Wolverhampton) has received a first yellow card.
Tottenham's Eric Dier breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Sergio Reguilon with Steven Bergwijn. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Tottenham.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Ruben Neves (Wolverhampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In Wolverhampton, Pedro Neto of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
At Molineux Stadium, Fernando Marcal has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 69, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Wolverhampton's Nelson Semedo has been booked in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 70, Moussa Sissoko is on a sub for Tanguy Ndombele for Tottenham.
Paul Tierney signals a Tottenham throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fernando Marcal.
In the minute 73, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Wolverhamptonâ€™s Fernando Marcal is on his feet again at Molineux Stadium.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 75, Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) has taken off Fernando Marcal who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Rayan Ait-Nouri is the replacement.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Tottenham.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 80, Wolverhampton drives forward and Ruben Neves gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 83, Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mourinho is making the team's third substitution at Molineux Stadium with Erik Lamela replacing Heung Min Son.
In the minute 84, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
The home team replace Joao Moutinho with Ebeguowen Otasowie.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Romain Saiss.
That's a fine assist from Pedro Neto.
In the minute 88, Fabio Silva of Wolverhampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Paul Tierney awards Tottenham a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolverhampton.
Paul Tierney will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Fabio Silva (Wolverhampton) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Tottenham are coming forward and Davinson Sanchez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
That's full-time at Molineux Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Vitinha is replacing Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
